channel.title: ::Need to know,,why does my comp crash?::
channel.description: Hey, this is the second time my computer crashed and i got it fixed and both reasons was from trying to create a private server, i pretty much got it created and all and like well it crashed this time because i think its from playing with environment variables too much idk or its cause firewall was off, but would everyone tell me the suggestions of a safe way to create/host a private server to prevent crashes?

item.title: ::Need to know,,why does my comp crash?::
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

install your router before doing anything .
because you wont be able to run your server, once u put ur router up

Read full topic
item.source: ::Need to know,,why does my comp crash?::

item.title: ::Need to know,,why does my comp crash?::
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

lmao i don’t watch porn btw…

and i have a router just not hooked to my computer yet i was getting it hooked tonight but i ran into this crash so i had to see my uncle to fix it and thats where im at right now.

Read full topic
